verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: There's a peace I've come to know

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: Though my heart and flesh may fail

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines: There's an echo for my soul

verse.name: c1e
verse.lines: He is risen from the dead

verse.name: c1f
verse.lines: And I will rise, when He calls my name

verse.name: c1g
verse.lines: No more sorrow, no more pain

verse.name: c1h
verse.lines: I will rise on eagles wings

verse.name: c1i
verse.lines: before my God fall on my knees

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: There's a day that's drawing near

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: And this darkness breaks to light
